A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is ok and that's bad. Plot holes everywhere. underwhelming new characters\, some scenes are boring and unnecessary (yeah\, I'm looking at you casino scene) and they waste a lot of good characters. For me this was a disappointment. You'll laugh from time to time and you'll enjoy the music and cinematography (this is a very gorgeous movie) but that's it. The story is far from interesting and it has some poor writing. Don't expect much.
